item.description:
Apollo Grill, 116 Pleasant Street, Easthampton, Ma.

Click on the meetup link for a map.

The food is great, the people are great, very reasonably priced, and plenty of parking. This is a link to their dinner menu; http://apollo-grill.c...

I've tried just about everything on the menu, liked it all. In particular I think they have the best burger in the valley. They also have a very good selection of beer on tap (go Kim) , wine, and a full bar.
item.name: Apollo Grill, Wednesday, 2/22, 6:30PM
